/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are muted, with shades of gray and green dominating the palette. Despite the absence of vibrant hues, the image conveys a sense of the city's daily hustle and bustle.
